channel.title: Help!
channel.description: I'm using a PI base and my server didn't come with a donator sign in public chat. Can someone show me how to add it? Btw, the donator sign shows in yell, but not in public chat. Also, I need help with the crowns for PMs. Like, when an admin PMs someone, their crown shows as a mod crown. I forgot what it was for mod.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

I’m using a PI base and my server didn’t come with a donator sign in public chat. Can someone show me how to add it? Btw, the donator sign shows in yell, but not in public chat. Also, I need help with the crowns for PMs. Like, when an admin PMs someone, their crown shows as a mod crown. I forgot what it was for mod.

Read full topic
